General.Name: Ningbo Zhongbai Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. primarily operates department stores in China. The company provides dry aquatic and seafood; and real estate development, house leasing, property management, and indoor parking services. It also specializes in cotton, silk, woolen, and garment processing activities. In addition, it offers jewelry, cosmetics, daily necessities, glasses, handicrafts, toys, and sporting goods and equipment. Further it provides mechanical equipment, household appliances, electronic products, communication equipment, building decoration materials, and furniture. The company was formerly known as Hit. Shouchuang Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

1.Name: Mr. Peng  Yan
1.Title: Vice Chairman, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
